titleStmt.title: Dantur rationes boni, & mali æternæ, & indispensabiles.
titleStmt.author: Cudworth, Ralph, 1617-1688.

notesStmt.note: Dated and signed at end: Jun. 30. 1651. In Vesperiis Comitiorum. Resp. Dre. Cudworth Anl. Clar. Præfect.
Suggested place of publication and publication date from Wing.
Text in two parallel columns; second column has caption title that reads: Dantur substantæ incorporeæ, naturâ suâ immortales.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
